title: WCSC
brief_description:
Tune in as Jerry and Bruce commentate the sports event of the millennium! Rushkov versus Javichenko. Be sure to experience the giddying highs of Friday night WCSC live at Viagro Stadium.
Animated work. Includes animated nudity. Voices - Trent Baker, Simon Philamon. Written, directed and animated by Michael Hill.
